name: Boursin Chicken
ingredients: Salt and pepper, or seasonings of your choice
5.2 ounce package Boursin garlic and herb cheese *
10 ounce package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained very well

instructions.en: Trim fat from chicken breasts. Butterfly each breast by making a shallow vertical cut in the middle, then horizontal cuts to create flaps. Cover with plastic wrap and pound to even thickness. Season both sides.
Stir together the Boursin cheese and drained spinach.
Place 1/4 of the spinach mixture in the center of each chicken breast. Fold sides over to cover filling, sealing the opening. Place seam side down in a greased baking dish.
Sprinkle with seasoning salt or garlic powder. Place a pat of butter on each piece of chicken.
Bake at 375Â°F for 25-30 minutes or until chicken juices are no longer pink.

notes: * Do not use homemade Boursin Cheese Spread as it won't hold up to baking. This recipe makes 4 servings. Freezing is not recommended.
